channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report E-2023070949
item.description:
Report E-2023070949

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift for into the one poly 55 gallon drum of sonic kleen (un1760) releasing 2 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report E-2023070965
item.description:
Report E-2023070965

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-19T00:29:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-21
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: GROENDYKE TRANSPORT INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver stated as he was unloading his last compartment that fuel started over flowing out of the customers 2nd unleaded tank. Driver grabbed the mattress out of his sleeper & threw on the ground to stop the spill from spreading. Driver estimates the spill was approximately 20 gallons & has evaporated off the concrete but the asphalt is still wet. driver was requested to send pictures immediately to safety on call. EMI has been contacted to clean up spill & dispose of mattress.
